title: The Duet Dilemma
description: Emma Fox is a walking disaster.Noah Kincaid is perfection personified.She’s all over the place. He’s controlled. She’s got a sweet tooth the size of Canada, and he only takes his coffee black. While Emma is failing out of their university’s piano program, Noah is at the top of the class.But when the two opposites are partnered together for a duet, sparks fly on and off the piano.There’s just two tiny issues: 1. Finn, the cupcake-thieving charmer who keeps showing up at Emma’s work. 2. Oliver Bishop, the famous piano god Emma's been crushing on since kindergarten.Three guys. One Emma.No amount of college prep could’ve prepared her for this.The Duet Dilemma is the first book in The Duet Diaries series, a slow build Reverse Harem.
author: Maggie  Evans
